title: Motorist has twilight sighting south of Oquawka.
observed: I seen a big harry figure standing in the shallow creek. I was in my truck as I approached this creature. I shut my truck off and watched this thing. I then heard a loud deep roar from the other side of the creek. When I looked to where that sound came from I couldnt see anything. I turned back to where I had seen the creature and it was gone.
location_details: On a secondary road at a creek crossing.
